title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 March 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has quit  
06:59 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:36 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:10 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:35 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:41 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:03 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <vmassol> good morning everyone  
09:30 <vmassol> hope you had a good we! :)  
09:31 <vmassol> so today is a big day, it's the 7.0M2 release day  
09:31 <vmassol> mflorea: since you fixed a test this morning, I assume you're on the release already?  
09:32 <vmassol> hmm I'm going to retsart jenkins now  
09:33 <vmassol> doing it cleanly (waiting for builds to finish)  
09:41 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:45 <mflorea> vmassol: I'm checking the failing tests atm, looking at the WYSIWYG tests now. As for the release, I'd like to finish http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11506 before 7.0M2, but I need 2 more days for it.  
09:47 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <mflorea> brb  
09:47 <mflorea> has quit  
09:55 <gdelhumeau> has quit

10:20 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki

12:15 <vmassol> has quit  
12:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

12:53 <cjd> has quit  
13:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:29 <gsmeria> has quit  
13:44 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:08 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <vmassol> Enygma`: you just fixed http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-filter-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.filter.test.ui/FilterTest/testConvertXMLURL/ right?  
14:16 <vmassol> actually I broke it over the week end  
14:16 <vmassol> (since I renamed the app by putting uppercase)  
14:17 <vmassol> checking  
14:19 <vmassol> ouch this is ugly tmortagne  
14:19 <vmassol> Thread.sleep(30000);  
14:20 <vmassol> and no page object :(  
14:20 <vmassol> Enygma`: ok I see you fixed it :)  
14:35 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <Enygma`> vmassol: yes, it should pass now from the looks of it  
15:09 <msmeria> has quit  
15:18 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
15:26 <vmassol> lots of failure in extensions: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/lastBuild/testReport/  
15:26 <vmassol> guys today is supposed to be release day for 7.0M2  
15:27 <vmassol> what's your status for 7.0M2 (Marius said he'd like to finish one issue on his side, what about others?)  
15:29 <vmassol> tmortagne: I see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11866 and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6058  
15:29 <vmassol> do you need those before M2 is released?  
15:29 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: anything you need to do for M2?  
15:29 <vmassol> Enygma`: same question  
15:29 <tmortagne> vmassol: I'm almost done with XWIKI-11866  
15:29 <gdelhumeau> nope  
15:30 <tmortagne> I removed the fix for on the other, it's something I want done in 7.0 but it's not really a blocker  
15:32 <vmassol> ok tmortagne. mflorea we're pretty late for the release because it's not stable ATM (the RM needs to prepare for the release 2-3 days in advance to ensure it can be released on the defined date)  
15:32 <vmassol> (the RM needs to gather everyone before the ETA date and make everyone fix the tests)  
15:48 <Enygma`> vmassol: working on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11760 and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11853 ... still have some work to do and maybe some tests. Not sure I want to drag the release for that. If I manage for M2 I`ll try to push it, otherwise I`m going to have to move it to RC1.  
15:50 <cjd> has quit  
15:50 <carlez> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <carlez> Hello! Quick question: how can I add an object to a page from a component in java? Thanks  
15:57 <tmortagne> carlez: yes  
15:57 <vmassol> carlez: see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/APIGuide  
15:57 <vmassol> for example: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/APIGuide#HAddobjectstoapage  
15:58 <tmortagne> Provider<XWikiContext> xcontext;  
15:58 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:58 <vmassol> for the context: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/WritingComponents#HTheXWikicontext  
15:58 <vmassol> tmortagne: we need to update this tutorial with the provider… doing it  
15:59 <tmortagne> vmassol: depends  
15:59 <tmortagne> what is in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/APIGuide#HAddobjectstoapage does not depend on oldcore  
15:59 <vmassol> I'll mention that  
15:59 <tmortagne> \*http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/WritingComponents#HTheXWikicontext  
16:00 <tmortagne> carlez: you will need a dependency on xwiki-platform-oldcore to manipulate those API, that's stuff we were not yet able to move  
16:01 <vmassol> done  
16:05 <carlez> I have a working component with oldcore dependency. I don't understand how create and then append the object to a document in java from my component.  
16:06 <vmassol> carlez: see the links we provided to you above  
16:06 <vmassol> and tell what you don't understand after you've read them thoroughly  
16:06 <vmassol> Guys on a different topic has any of you registered the "xwiki" user on Docker's Hub? https://hub.docker.com/u/xwiki/  
16:07 <vmassol> I would have liked to reserve the "xwiki" org name for the xwiki project  
16:07 <Bugen\_do> has joined #xwiki

23:46 <debajit> has joined #xwiki  
23:46 <debajit> I want to search for all documents authored by a particular user. What should I type in the XWiki search bar?  
23:47 <vmassol> debajit: I've replied on the list  
23:51 <debajit> has quit  
23:55 <debajit> has joined #xwiki  
23:55 <debajit> searching for space:SpaceName worked :) thanks  
23:56 <vmassol> yw  
23:56 <debajit> Similarly, how do I search for a particular author?  
23:56 <debajit> author:<AuthorName> does not work. author:<EmailAddress> does not work either  
23:59 <vmassol> author\_display:superadmin for example seems to work for me  
23:59 <vmassol> in solrconfig.xml I see:  
23:59 <vmassol> https://gist.github.com/vmassol/1a00b3b8008f76f1e03f
